content: **knitted wrist warmers with flip tops / convertible mittens in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked in rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #swipeawaymittens drops design pattern me-294 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl circumference 19-21 cm length 23-24 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 11 crimson red drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops crochet hook size 3 mm **buttons** drops buttons no 805 2 items in all sizes **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
